title: IP Address Tracker
description: Search for any valid IPv4 or IPv6 address
Access detauked information including location, timezone, and ISP
View its location on an interactive map integrated with Leaflet and Google Maps

title: GlobeWeather
description: Search any city worldwide with autocomplete suggestions
Contains real-time weather data including temperature, wind speed, and humidity, provided by the OpenWeatherMap API
Dynamic backgrounds and unit toggle for metric/imperial measurements
